column4: have Ubuntu running on brand new machine, wanna install Windows XP now, with dua booting capability.  What's the word?
have QTParted installed, btw, just in case I need it
Yep, it's possible. Make a free partition, install windows xp on that partition. Then use a rescue disk to get into the linux partition. Alter the grub configuration then do update-grub.
can i use QTParted to make a free partition?  never used it before, been looking around, didn't ave much success
